bomberman.core.logic
Class LogicWorld

java.lang.Object
  bomberman.core.logic.LogicWorld
Direct Known Subclasses:
DecoratedWorld
public class LogicWorld
extends java.lang.Object

The class responsible for managing all logic game-related aspects during a single round of game play. This includes (1) ensuring that the EntityEngine is notified of updates, (2) keeping track of the player's scoring and other game's informations like timer, and (3) managing the game state when rounds end or begin.

Author:
Federico Scozzafava
